q1: I am obsessed with this team
a1: Me too, I hope they do well next season.
q2: I don't think they will win this season though
a2: Well that's a mean thing to say about Real Madrid in any language.
q3: Do you think Real Madrid will pip Barca this year ?
a3: They will give them a run for their money.
q4: Real Madrid's reputation as a major club was established by their outstanding record in the European Cup. To date, they have been crowned champions of Europe a record thirteen times.
a4: But losing Ronaldo this year could result in a down year for them in terms of the league and the CL.
q5: is Barca that good for RM?
a5: Barca is doing better, but we will see
